name: 58 Seconds
description:
In this game, you have to get to the end before the time runs out, and you have just under a minute. Can you do it?

CONTROLS

A and D or arrow keys to move, space to jump, and S to fall fast. (Using S is needed to complete it in time)

.

Proof it's possible :P

Made in 3 hours for Trijam #155
